title: African American migration to North - cause

content.question: African American migration to the urban North during the First World War was due primarily to

choices.label: racially integrated residential neighborhoods in Northern cities
increased educational opportunities resulting from affirmative-action programs
expanded job opportunities in Northern factories
encouragement by White Protestant churches in the North

content.answer: expanded job opportunities in Northern factories

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
